channel.title: Lychee Blog
channel.description: Lychee is a free photo-management tool, which runs on your server or web-space. Upload, manage and share photos like from a native application. Lychee comes with everything you need and all your photos are stored securely.

item.title: What is on the Santa Claus wish list?
item.description: We discuss the future of Lychee. What is the vision for the project? What is next on the roadmap?

item.title: Lychee Version 6 is Live!
item.description: We are excited to announce the release of Lychee version 6, a complete rewrite of the frontend for an drastically improved user experience.

item.title: Bite-size v6: Beta.2 is Live!
item.description: Bite-size v6 is a series of small post showing the progress made on the development of the future version of Lychee.

item.title: About Lychee API documentation
item.description: With v6 at the horizon, we had to drop the support of Scramble, a library responsible for automated API documentation. We explain here the reasons which motivated such choice.

item.title: The future of Lychee: what is coming next. 🚀

item.title: Livewire performances problems 📉
item.description: A look back on Server-Side rendering performance with Livewire in Lychee v5.
